title: CRYO LAB — Extracted at 2°C. For 22 Hours.
description: A luxury precision cold brew coffee lab landing page for the fictional brand CRYO LAB. Dark espresso palette with cold blue accents, Hero Type G scroll-driven word split (COLD moves left+up / BREW moves right+down) with lab ruler line and temperature readout between. Features count-up extraction timer, TDS spectrum cards with animated bars, origin series with radar data, numbered lab notes blog, and subscription dial selector.
heroDescription: Scroll-driven text transform: COLD moves left+upward, BREW moves right+downward. Lab ruler vertical line fades in between. Temperature readout 2.1°C appears between words. 200vh hero with sticky viewport.
